title: Pelatonement, The Biggest Flop Ever Is NOW IN THEATERS! 12.10.19
itunes:title: Pelatonement, The Biggest Flop Ever Is NOW IN THEATERS! 12.10.19
description:
In episode 532, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Bechdel Cast co-host Caitlin Durante to discuss updates in the Peloton ad saga, the impeachment trial being a mess, William Barr undermining his own investigative report, some art drama at Art Basel in Miami, the passing of Caroll Spinney aka Big Bird, Golden Globe nominations, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The "Peloton Husband" is making the best of that terrible ad
  2. Ryan Reynolds Comes Up With The “Peloton Girl’ Aftermath For His Gin Brand – UPDATE: “Peloton Girl” Speaks Out
  3. Lawyer for Democrats calls President Trump 'a clear and present danger' as he argues case for removal
  4. READ: Barr Undermines His Own DOJ IG’s Report On Trump-Russia FBI Probe
  5. Watchdog report finds FBI not motivated by political bias in Trump probe
  6. Banana Splits: Spoiled by Its Own Success, the $120,000 Fruit Is Gone
  7. A Boston Artist Was Arrested for Writing “Epstein Didn’t Kill Himself” on the Art Basel Banana Wall
  8. Caroll Spinney, Better Known as Big Bird, Has Died
  9. Golden Globes Nominations: ‘Marriage Story’, Netflix, ‘Once Upon A Time In Hollywood’ Lead Way In Film – Full List Of Nominations
  10. WATCH: DJ Krush - Drum

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
